GameDBLocalizedString.Text: An artifact.\nCast tech abilities at <color=SOTS_COLOR_ENERGY>Half the Energy</color>.

How much of your soul are you willing to sacrifice for knowledge? Spending a few months merged with the Machine Spirit will likely change you into a babbling, toaster-loving freak. But you want it all, and you want it now!
An artifact.\nEvery time a unit is killed in combat, hero can use his abilities again.
From this moment a voice lurks in your head. It is patiently waiting for its moment and when an enemy finally gives you a heavy blow it starts to sing about vengeance.
An artifact.\nResets special abilities cooldown timer of friendly units when any unit dies in combat.
It isn't your voice, but it speaks through you. Inspiring and kindling, making all your warriors feel the rage for fallen comrades changing them to restless avengers.
An artifact.\nAdditional counter attack for all friendly units.

It is not only you, your troops feel the change too. Some may fight it, some may dread it but deep down they started to crave every chance to hurt and destroy. It's dirty, but since when is warfare... fair?
